tasks.task: Inspect corn plants affected by drought-induced heat scald to assess yield potential.
subtasks: Observe the degree of heat scald on corn leaves.
Evaluate the health and photosynthetic activity of damaged leaves.
Check the condition and completeness of corn ears under heat-stressed conditions.
Assess the impact of shallow soil and rock presence on root development and ear formation.
Compare yield potential between different corn hybrids and populations.
Determine the stage of corn development (dent stage) and potential for further kernel abortion.
Predict adverse effects on kernel size, test weight, and overall yield due to environmental stress.
Provide recommendations for future management and potential harvest outcomes.
